Full Format Class¶

Created on Mon Mar 12 09:42:12 2018

@author: Diego Britez

class full_format_class.FullFormat(_Var, _tshape, dim)[source]¶

FullFormat is a class that represents the n-dimensional array numpy.ndarray.

Attributes

_tshape: array like, with the numbers of elements that each 1-rank
tensor is going to discretize each subspace of the full tensor.

dim: integer type, number that represent the n-rank tensor that is going to be represented. The value of dim must be coherent with the size of _tshape parameter.

_Var: n-dimensional array that the tensor object represents.

dimsize(ind)[source]¶

returns the size of the specified dimension. Same as shape[ind].

ndims()[source]¶

returns the number of dimensions.

size()[source]¶

returns the number of elements in the tensor

tondarray()[source]¶

return an ndarray that contains the data of the tensor
